definition: to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb
to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing

sentences.english: Accepted and run, let love stand the fleeting time.
sentences.chinese: 接納與磨合，讓愛經得起流年。

sentences.english: Be open to new ideas, new ways of seeing things and new styles.
sentences.chinese: 要開放地接納新觀點，看事物的新角度，新風格。

sentences.english: As the writer states, we are being treated as heirs or sons of heaven.
sentences.chinese: 正如作者所述，我們被接納爲天國的兒女和後嗣。
可接納50人左右團隊，自備停車場。

sentences.english: This is the difference. The Sea of Galilee receives but does not keep the Jordan.
sentences.chinese: 加利利海接納約旦河水但並不守着河一滴不放。

sentences.english: Please indicate that if you wish to accept a Classic Card if you are not offered a Platinum Card.
sentences.chinese: 倘若你的白金卡申請未被接納，是否願意接受普通卡？

sentences.english: The song has a syncopated rhythm in the jazz version.
sentences.chinese: 這首歌曲改編爲爵士樂後接納了切分音節拍。

sentences.english: Some donors and health communities have embraced micronutrient interventions.
sentences.chinese: 一些捐助者和衛生界已經接納了微量營養物質干預。

sentences.english: Sir, I should very much like to be admitted to the B. Sc. course in your college.
sentences.chinese: 主席先生，我非常想被接納爲學士課程，您的大學。

sentences.english: In order to work towards adaptable personalized context-aware services, we need to elaborate the requirements.
sentences.chinese: 爲了接納個性化環境敏感服務，我們需要提升需求。

sentences.english: I would like to admit the eldership's ideas, so I could walk steadily.
sentences.chinese: 願意接納長輩們的建議，讓自己走得更穩健。

sentences.english: This is a faithful saying and worthy of all acceptation .
sentences.chinese: 這話是可信的，是值得完全接納的。

sentences.english: He beseeched the Lord to allow the old man’s soul into heaven.
sentences.chinese: 他懇求上帝接納這老人的靈魂於天堂。

sentences.english: Refers to the quotable additional qualification which is acceptable to the Medical Council of Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 意指已獲香港醫務委員會接納的認可額外資格。

sentences.english: The Bank reserves the right to accept any order for collection only.
sentences.chinese: 本行保留僅以代收方式接納任何付款指示之權利。

sentences.english: The auditor must be able to adapt to the auditee's situation.
sentences.chinese: 審覈員必須能接納被審覈方的情況。

definition: to approve of/to endorse/to acknowledge/to recognize/to identify oneself with
persons involved or implicated/party (to an affair)
to release/to set free/to liberate (a prisoner)/to discharge
